## Master thesis 
8 months, funded by Erasmus+ program 

Supervisors: Pr: M. Campioli and Dr: Jozica Gricar 

Centre of Excellence Plants and Ecosystems [(PLECO)](https://www.uantwerpen.be/en/research-groups/pleco/), Antwerp, Belgium and at the [Slovenian foresty institut](https://www.gozdis.si/en/), Ljubljana, Slovenia   

---------------- 

My master thesis was part of the ERC project [LEAF-FALL](https://www.uantwerpen.be/en/research-groups/pleco/research/research-projects/erc-grants/erc-grant-leaf-fall/).I sutdied the inter-individual variability in spring phenology of temperate deciduous trees in relation to tree characteristics and previous year autumn phenology, More details about my thesis in the two papers i published about it: [Marchand et al 2020](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.agrformet.2020.108031)  and [Marchand et al 2021b](https://doi.org/10.1093/treephys/tpaa171)
